column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm a fan of Randolph street solely because of its exotic and diverse culinary scene
column2: including Little Goat diner! I have to say
column3: I was more than eager to try it out and had very high expectation
column4: mostly from friends' recommendation and terrific online reviews. So when my friend had a short and sweet transit in Chicago on her way back to WI
column5: I suggested Little Goat for breakfast. My bf and I got to the place at about 9 am
column6: didn't realize that most parking on Randolph is valet
column7: so we did meter parking on Washington street
column9: and saved $14. My friend was already there
column10: so we got seated almost immediately. Don't get me wrong
column12: so if we had gotten there closer to brunch time
column13: I'm sure we would wait a little longer.
